dict.string: The flipswitch toggle will disable Tinct, but you will need to respring/restart apps for this change to properly apply.
This will enable the features of Chroma (replaces standard tints but does not customise nav bar background etc.) for any apps which are exluded in the 'Excluded Apps' list.
This option is only available on devices which support blur and adds blending to all nav bar items (similar to labels in the default notification centre).

This will use Apple's standard black blur view if you select #000000 for any blur view tint colour (e.g. nav bar background, control centre, HUD) - this provides a less opaque effect than Tinct's normal black tint colour.
Disabling the 'Status Bar' option in advanced settings will use either black or white, rather than colouring the status bar to your title colour.
